TopicTitle: Allow rename/type change of CMs without electric charge

Articles.Content:
Sometimes you'll undock a unneeded probe command module, or small piece with a command mondule that you don't care about anymore and as far you are concerned is debris. If you're busy with something else and don't get back to it before the electric charge runs out you can no longer rename the ship or change the type. The name and type is the same as the ship that you just undocked from, and the only way to get this debris off your map is to goto the tracking station and delete it there.

At that point, to get it off your map, there becomes an annoying process to make sure you're deleting the right thing and not your multi-launch interplanetary ship you've been working on for hours.

Is there a reason we can no longer rename the ship, or have it automatically default to debris at least? Perhaps create a new class of "dead ships", things with command modules but no power? It seems to me this would be an easy change.
